rows.label: tlk70000007_04_msg0001
rows.name:
All the kids in Iira just
think you guys are the
coolest. Did you know that?

rows.label: tlk70000007_04_msg0002
rows.name:
To us kids, you're almost like gods.
It doesn't make you feel weird to
hear stuff like that, does it?

rows.label: tlk70000007_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Maybe it's silly to say, but sometimes I
think if I wasn't so sick, I'd like to grow
up to be like you guys, helping people.

rows.label: tlk70000007_04_msg0004
rows.name:
I'm looking forward to being a grown-up
so I can give something back.

rows.label: tlk70000007_04_msg0005
rows.name:
Someday I'll be able to say to my
mum, "I'm all better now! Now it's
my turn to look after you!"

rows.label: tlk70000007_04_msg0006
rows.name:
Hack hack...hargh! Yeah...
I hope I'll see that day.
